price: Kõ wãne ne yake fã ra halitta sa'an nan kuma ya mayar da ita, kuma Wãne ne Ya azurta ku daga sama da ƙasa? Ashe, akwai wani abin bautãwa tãre da Allah? Ka ce: "Ku kãwo dalĩlinku idan kun kasance mãsu gaskiya."
arabic: أَمَّن يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ وَمَن يَرۡزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ قُلۡ هَاتُواْ بُرۡهَٰنَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: amman yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu waman yarzuqukum mina al-samāi wal-arḍi a-ilāhun maʿa al-lahi qul hātū bur'hānakum in kuntum ṣādiqīna
